description: Number of 0's in binary expansion of Fibonacci(n).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..1000
maple: with(combinat): a := proc (n) local fbin: fbin := convert(fibonacci(n), base, 2): nops(fbin)-add(fbin[j], j = 1 .. nops(fbin)) end proc: seq(a(n), n = 0 .. 80); [From _Emeric Deutsch_, Jul 09 2009]
prog: (PARI) b(n)= { if (n==0, return(1)); c=0; i=n; until (i<=1, q=i/2; if (frac(q)==0, c++); i=floor(q); ); return (c); } { for (n = 0, 1000, a=b(fibonacci(n)); write("b059016.txt", n, " ", a); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 24 2009]
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jan 15 2001.
extensions: Removed \\allocatemem(932245000); from my PARI program _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 04 2009
